text: Eggo is a brand of frozen waffles sold in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. It is owned by the Kellogg Company. There are several kinds of Eggo, including Homestyle, blueberry, strawberry, apple cinnamon, and chocolate chip. It was introduced in 1953. It is one of the largest frozen waffle companies in the United States.Belsie, Laurent. Eggo Waffles Facing Shortage Until mid-2010 The Christian Science Monitor (November 17, 2009). title: Eggo
